description: This file defines a React component named NotesList, which renders a panel displaying a list of notes with search functionality, creation of new notes, and visualization of note previews including titles, excerpts, and relative last edited dates.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, searchQuery, onSearchChange, onCreateNote, allNotesCount })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the notes list panel with search, creation, and note selection capabilities.
